info.title: Future Me API
info.description: Future Me is a time capsule letter platform that allows users to send letters to their future self or loved ones, scheduled for delivery on a future date. This API provides endpoints for user authentication, letter creation and management, draft system, scheduled delivery, notifications, and media attachments.

post.description: Create a new Future Me user account. Email must be unique; password requires â‰¥8 characters. A verification code will be sent to the provided email address. Guest letters sent from this email will be automatically linked to the account.

201.description: User registered successfully. Verification code sent to email.

400.description: Bad request - Invalid input or user already exists

post.description: Complete email verification using the 6-digit code sent to the user's email. Returns access and refresh tokens upon successful verification. Any guest letters sent from this email will be automatically linked to the account.

200.description: Email verified successfully. Access and refresh tokens returned.

400.description: Bad request - Invalid or expired verification code

post.description: Authenticate a verified user and receive access/refresh tokens. The account must be verified before login.

200.description: Login successful. Returns access and refresh tokens.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid credentials or unverified account

post.description: Use the refreshToken httpOnly cookie to obtain a new access token and rotate the refresh token cookie, without re-authenticating. No request body is required.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or expired refresh token

post.description: Logs out the user by revoking the current refresh token associated with the refreshToken httpOnly cookie and clearing that cookie.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing refresh token cookie

post.description: Trigger a password reset email/code for the user account. A 6-digit reset code will be sent to the registered email address.

200.description: Password reset code sent to email

post.description: Confirm the reset code and set a new password. The code must match the one sent via email.

400.description: Bad request - Invalid code, password mismatch, or validation error

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or expired reset code

post.description: Resends the email verification auth code for unverified users. Use this if you didn't receive the initial verification email.

400.description: Bad request - Invalid email or user already verified

post.description: Triggers another password-reset auth code using the same flow as forgot password. Use this if you didn't receive the password reset code.

get.description: Retrieve all countries. Optionally filter by region (AFRICA, AMERICAS, ASIA, EUROPE, OCEANIA). Returns countries sorted alphabetically by name.
Determine the caller's country based on their IP address. Uses the incoming request IP and an external IP geolocation service.

200.description: Country data derived from the caller's IP address

schema.description: Raw IP geolocation response (see ipapi.co docs for exact shape).

get.description: Retrieve a specific country by its ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code (e.g., NG for Nigeria, US for United States).

post.description: Create a letter as a guest user. Guests can send only 1 letter per recipient email. Rate limited to 10 requests per hour. Guest letters are automatically linked to user accounts when the guest signs up with the same email.

data.subject: A Letter to My Future Self

400.description: Bad request - Invalid input or validation error

409.description: Conflict - Guest has already sent a letter to this recipient. Sign up to send more.

example.message: You have already sent a letter to this recipient. Please sign up to send more letters.

post.description: Create a letter as an authenticated user. Rate limited to 20 requests per hour. Letter is scheduled for delivery on the specified date.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid JWT token

get.description: Retrieve all letters for the authenticated user. Letters with delivery dates in the future are returned in locked format (minimal info). Optionally filter by status (DRAFT, SCHEDULED, DELIVERED, FAILED).

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid JWT token

post.description: Create a letter as a draft. Drafts can be updated later before sending. Drafts are always visible to the user (not locked).

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid JWT token

get.description: Retrieve a specific letter by ID. Only accessible if the delivery date has been reached. Returns 403 if delivery date hasn't been reached yet.

403.description: Forbidden - Delivery date has not been reached yet

example.message: You cannot view this letter because the delivery date has not been reached yet

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid JWT token

patch.description: Update a draft letter. Only letters with DRAFT status can be updated. Sent letters cannot be modified. Attachments are replaced if provided.

400.description: Bad request - Cannot update sent letter or invalid input

403.description: Forbidden - Not authorized to update this letter

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid JWT token

delete.description: Delete a letter. Only letters with delivery dates that have passed can be deleted. Returns 400 if delivery date hasn't passed yet.

400.description: Bad request - Cannot delete letter before delivery date

example.message: You cannot delete this letter because the delivery date has not passed yet

403.description: Forbidden - Not authorized to delete this letter

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid JWT token
